name: 2nd Circle - Powerful Places
description:
You are Wizard. More precise you are a Wizard Apprentice.

In a dark world, the 2nd Circle stands between Humanity,
and the things that hides in the Shadows.
And you are the newest fighter in this war.

Learn to fight monster and sling spells.

First you can change the way you look.

Then You choose which type of Sorcerer you want to be.
Fire - Earth - Water - Air or Metal.
Each Element has it own unique spells.

Some Elements works well on some enemies, while others does very little damage.

If you choose the path of Fire You will cast spells like:
The Circle of Fire: Or Strongest Spell The FireLord



First you will learn to cast simple spells, and then more and more powerful spells.

This spell is called "Falling Skye" and is blocks of Hard Earth Falling and killing enemies.


You will also get different Wands, that will help you cast stronger spells.
But the real price are the Crystals. Mined deep beneath the earth, with many different abilities.





After completing the first levels you will get into the more challenging part.
You will meet more and more dangerous Enemies.

When you have completed the beginner part, you can create a custom character with some skill.
You can choose the become any type of mage, to find if you can complete the game as a Air Wizard.

The stronger enemies Cast complex spells and summons Beast and monsters to fight on their side.
